identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a 'Modern Bureaucrat' aesthetic that blends Swiss precision with the warmth of high-end financial stationery. Trust is the currency.
principles: Fusion: Government Authority (Serif fonts) + Fintech Speed (Clean UI)
Emotion: Calm Competence. The user is stressed; the UI is the anchor.
Content: Every label must be clear. No jargon without explanation.
Zoom: Focus on the 'Risk Score' as the hero element.
Negative Space: Use 'Paper' margins. Don't crowd the tax return.

typography.instructions: Use Playfair Display for all major section headers to evoke the feeling of a 'Financial Times' headline or a legal deed. Use Inter for all form inputs and data tables for maximum legibility.

usage_rules: Never use pure black. Use Slate-900.
Backgrounds should be Stone-50 (warm grey) to reduce eye strain, not stark white.
Use the 'Risk Level' colors ONLY for status badges and score indicators. Do not use them for decoration.

grid_system.marketing: Mode A: Tetris Grid (Asymmetrical, wide gaps)
grid_system.dashboard: Mode B: High Density (Tight gaps, data correlation)

containers.card: rounded-xl border border-stone-200 bg-white shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200

buttons.primary: bg-slate-900 text-white hover:bg-slate-800 rounded-md px-8 py-3 font-medium shadow-sm transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-900 border border-stone-200 hover:bg-stone-50 rounded-md px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-all
buttons.ghost: text-slate-600 hover:text-slate-900 hover:bg-stone-100 rounded-md px-4 py-2

inputs.style: bg-white border-stone-200 focus:border-slate-900 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-slate-900 rounded-md h-12 px-4
inputs.label: text-sm font-medium text-slate-700 mb-2 block

badges.base: inline-flex items-center rounded-full px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-semibold transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-ring focus:ring-offset-2 border

cards.risk_card: flex flex-col justify-between p-6 bg-white border-l-4 border-l-slate-900 shadow-sm rounded-r-xl

visual_enhancers.textures: Use a subtle 'noise' texture on the Stone-50 background to give it a paper feel.
visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-[0_2px_8px_rgba(0,0,0,0.04)] for cards. shadow-[0_12px_24px_rgba(0,0,0,0.08)] for floating elements.

hero_bg.usage: Hero section background with heavy overlay (bg-slate-900/90) to ensure text readability.

trust_indicator.usage: About section or 'Why Trust Us' feature block.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure all text meets WCAG AA. Slate-600 on Stone-50 is the minimum for body text.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible ring-2 ring-slate-900 offset-2 on all interactive elements.

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use gradients for the main background. Keep it solid Stone-50 or subtle noise.
DO NOT use 'Inter' for Headings. Use 'Playfair Display'.
DO NOT center text in the dashboard. Keep data left-aligned for scanning.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a tool that people use when they are afraid of the taxman. Your design must say 'We have this under control'. It should feel like a high-end private bank, not a startup. Use the 'Playfair Display' font to do the heavy lifting of 'Authority'. Use the 'Stone-50' background to do the heavy lifting of 'Calm'.
